Description: AWS CloudFormation Template for an Amazon EC2 instance running Amazon Linux AMI with SSH access

KeyName.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the instance
KeyName.ConstraintDescription: Must be the name of an existing EC2 KeyPair.

InstanceType.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid EC2 instance type.

VpcId.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid VPC Id.

SubnetId.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid Subnet Id.

InstanceId.Description: Instance ID of the created EC2 instance

PublicIP.Description: Public IP address of the created EC2 instance
